component.name: GitHub Store
component.summary: A cross-platform app store for GitHub releases

description.p: GitHub Store is a cross-platform "play store" for GitHub releases. It discovers repositories that ship real installable binaries and lets you install, track, and update them across platforms from one place.

ul.li: Smart discovery with Trending, Recently Updated, and New sections
Only shows repositories with installable assets (APK, EXE, DMG, AppImage, DEB, RPM, etc.)
Platform-aware filtering - automatically detects and shows installers for your OS
Always installs from the latest published release with changelog preview
Rich app details with README rendering, statistics, and developer info
GitHub OAuth login for higher API rate limits
Material 3 design with dynamic color support and dark mode
Cross-platform support for Android and Desktop (Windows, macOS, Linux)

description.p: Built with Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform for a consistent experience across all platforms.
A quality-of-life update focused on smoother navigation, smarter syncing, and richer localization.

ul.li: New liquid bottom navigation bar for a more fluid and modern experience
Favorites and feedback features on the details screen
Smarter data migration and improved system sync for better state alignment
New language support: Korean, Bengali, and Italian
Improved translations and localized theme options
Home screen refactored for better maintainability
Enhanced search experience with polished input behavior
Authentication improvements for more reliable sign-in
